name: The forest runner
description:
A man who is trying to get seeds from the forests. But the forests are secured with advanced technology and the ma now had to fight for those seeds for which he had to be packed up. So, with his Deagle, he started going inside the forest and the far he is going the difficulties are becoming tougher to face. He had to protect himself from spikes, robots, lava, and a lot of AI. There are deep cave and high mountains and with every level, he collects more and more seeds.

at the 5th stage he has to fight with the boss but after that something undetectable happens!!

Creators:-

         studious gamer - https://studiousgamer.itch.io/(Level design, programming)

         Arvie K - https://arvink005gmailcom.itch.io/(Game art, boss fight, programming)
